name: serpbear
tagline: A self-hosted SEO rank tracking dashboard
description: SerpBear is a self-hosted SEO rank tracker that monitors keyword positions across search engines. It offers charts, projects, and scheduled checks via a clean, mobile-friendly web UI.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Monitors search engine rankings for target keywords across Google and other engines

features.title: Position History
features.description: Charts ranking changes over time to identify trends and opportunities

features.title: Project Organization
features.description: Groups keywords into projects for managing multiple websites or clients

features.title: Scheduled Checks
features.description: Automatically updates rankings on configurable schedules

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Tracks rankings separately for mobile and desktop search results

features.title: Location Targeting
features.description: Monitors rankings for specific countries, regions, or cities

features.title: Competitor Tracking
features.description: Compares your rankings against competitor domains for the same keywords

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Sends alerts when rankings change significantly or reach thresholds
